title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to agentic AI (SNR201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者的智能体AI指南 (SNR201)
abstract: In a landscape of rapid AI evolution and daily headlines, senior leaders need clarity on what Agentic AI means for their business. This session cuts through the noise to provide a practical understanding of autonomous AI agents and their strategic implications for your organization. We will demystify Agentic AI and focus on what matters most to leaders. We will share how both management and architecture models will need to evolve to get value out of the autonomous AI systems.
abstract_cn: 在人工智能快速演进和每日头条新闻不断的环境中，高级领导者需要明确了解代理式AI对其业务的意义。本次会议将拨开迷雾，提供对自主AI代理及其对组织战略影响的实用理解。我们将揭开代理式AI的神秘面纱，聚焦于对领导者最重要的内容。我们将分享管理和架构模型如何需要演进，以从自主AI系统中获取价值。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure AI Agents Delivering Efficiency in Regulated Industries (WPS317)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在受监管行业中提供高效率的安全AI代理 (WPS317)
abstract: Regulated industries demand more than AI deployment—they require secure, efficient, and measurable outcomes. Holland Casino modernized cloud operations with a multi-agent system using AWS Strands Agents SDK, orchestrating agents for security, cost optimization, and operations support with fine-grained permissions. Sicoob, Brazil’s largest credit union, transformed operations with AI agents and digital employees: achieving 80%+ case resolution, cutting document processing time by 25%, deploying 80 digital employees to save 440,000 hours and R$23M, and automating 85% of credit operations. In this session, you’ll learn how organizations securely scale AI to cut costs, streamline compliance, and modernize operations.
abstract_cn: 受监管行业不仅需要部署AI，更需要安全、高效且可衡量的成果。Holland Casino通过使用AWS Strands Agents SDK的多代理系统实现了云运营现代化，协调安全、成本优化和运营支持代理，并配置细粒度权限。巴西最大的信用合作社Sicoob通过AI代理和数字员工实现了运营转型：案例解决率达80%以上，文档处理时间缩短25%，部署80名数字员工节省44万小时和2300万雷亚尔，信贷运营自动化率达85%。在本次会议中，您将了解组织如何安全地扩展AI以降低成本、简化合规并实现运营现代化。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Learn How Sky Powers the Future of Streaming with Redis Cloud (API209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 了解 Sky 如何利用 Redis Cloud 驱动流媒体的未来 (API209)
abstract: When Sky streamed to 23 million viewers during the Peacock-exclusive NFL Wild Card game, bookmarking ensured a seamless experience, handling up to 140,000+ writes per second during live events and 116,000 during record-breaking moments. To meet these demands, Redis Cloud delivered: cross-region active-active replication for global sync, sub-millisecond latency for spikes, and intelligent auto-scaling. Its write-behind capabilities cut costs and enabled a long-awaited AWS Keyspaces migration. Now, Sky’s GenAI platform, Genapi, leverages Redis Cloud's vector search and semantic caching to transform content discovery. Redis Cloud isn’t just solving scale, it’s powering Sky’s AI-driven future. This presentation is brought to you by Redis, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 当Sky在Peacock独家NFL外卡赛期间向2300万观众进行流媒体直播时,书签功能确保了无缝体验,在直播活动期间处理高达每秒140,000次以上的写入操作,在破纪录时刻处理116,000次写入。为满足这些需求,Redis Cloud提供了:跨区域主-主复制实现全球同步、亚毫秒级延迟应对峰值流量,以及智能自动扩展。其write-behind功能降低了成本,并实现了期待已久的AWS Keyspaces迁移。现在,Sky的GenAI平台Genapi利用Redis Cloud的向量搜索和语义缓存来转变内容发现方式。Redis Cloud不仅解决了规模问题,更在推动Sky的AI驱动未来。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Redis提供支持。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Capital One: Building resilient systems by engineering for five nines (IND3308)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Capital One：通过工程化实现五个九来构建弹性系统 (IND3308)
abstract: 99.999% availability—less than five minutes of downtime per year—is the gold standard for mission-critical applications. This session dives deep into architectural strategies to achieve such availability using AWS. We'll explore fault-tolerant patterns such as multi-Region deployments, active-active failover, circuit breakers, bulkheads, chaos testing, and event-driven designs. Learn how services like Amazon S3, Amazon DynamoDB Global Tables, and AWS Lambda can eliminate single points of failure. We’ll cover SLAs, SLOs, and engineering observability and automation to detect and respond to failures within milliseconds. Case studies and practical design guidance make this session ideal for architects and engineers building for extreme reliability.
abstract_cn: 99.999% 的可用性——每年停机时间少于五分钟——是关键任务应用程序的黄金标准。本次会议深入探讨使用 AWS 实现这种可用性的架构策略。我们将探索容错模式，如多区域部署、主动-主动故障转移、断路器、隔离舱、混沌测试和事件驱动设计。了解 Amazon S3、Amazon DynamoDB Global Tables 和 AWS Lambda 等服务如何消除单点故障。我们将介绍 SLA、SLO，以及工程可观测性和自动化，以便在毫秒内检测和响应故障。案例研究和实用设计指导使本次会议成为构建极致可靠性的架构师和工程师的理想选择。

presenter.name: Enrique Bastante
presenter.title: Sr. Customer Solutions Manager, AWS Strategic Accounts

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Staying Ahead: Smart Strategies for Effective Vulnerability Management (SEC316)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 保持领先：有效漏洞管理的智能策略 (SEC316)
abstract: This session explores modern  vulnerability management strategies for cloud and development environments.  We'll demonstrate how to integrate automated scanning and continuous  monitoring for both AWS compute resources and Git code repositories. Learn  how to identify misconfigurations, unpatched software, and insecure code  dependencies before they become threats. Attendees will gain practical  insights into prioritizing and remediating vulnerabilities across  infrastructure and code, unifying security efforts from development to  deployment. Join us to discover actionable techniques for reducing risk and  strengthening your organization's security posture in today's dynamic,  cloud-native landscape.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨云和开发环境的现代漏洞管理策略。我们将演示如何为 AWS 计算资源和 Git 代码仓库集成自动化扫描和持续监控。了解如何在配置错误、未修补软件和不安全的代码依赖项成为威胁之前识别它们。与会者将获得关于跨基础设施和代码优先处理和修复漏洞的实用见解，统一从开发到部署的安全工作。加入我们，探索在当今动态的云原生环境中降低风险和加强组织安全态势的可行技术。

presenter.name: Anthony Verleysen
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager Technical - External Services

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Integration patterns for distributed systems (API315)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 分布式系统的集成模式 (API315)
abstract: Today's applications are interconnected: they expose APIs, publish events, call third-party services, and externalize states. They must therefore address the fundamental challenges of distributed systems, such as out-of-order delivery, retries, idempotence, and partial failures. To address these challenges, architects must carefully evaluate integration options while considering how to manage complex system interactions. In this session, learn about common design trade-offs for distributed systems and how to navigate them with design patterns, illustrated by examples.
abstract_cn: 当今的应用程序是相互连接的：它们公开API、发布事件、调用第三方服务并外部化状态。因此，它们必须解决分布式系统的基本挑战，例如乱序交付、重试、幂等性和部分故障。为了应对这些挑战，架构师必须仔细评估集成选项，同时考虑如何管理复杂的系统交互。在本次会议中，了解分布式系统的常见设计权衡以及如何通过设计模式来应对这些权衡，并通过示例进行说明。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Traeger accelerates contact center agent productivity with agentic AI (BIZ214)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Traeger利用智能体AI加速联络中心座席生产力 (BIZ214)
abstract: Looking to learn how to transform customer insights into exceptional customer service experiences? Join this session to hear how Traeger Grills uses AI-powered Amazon Connect to drive automation, enabling agents and supervisors to focus on the human aspects of customer service. Learn how the agentic AI capabilities of Amazon Connect can help you streamline contact center workflows and automate routine actions, all while keeping the service experience top of mind.
abstract_cn: 想了解如何将客户洞察转化为卓越的客户服务体验？请参加本次会议，了解 Traeger Grills 如何使用 AI 驱动的 Amazon Connect 实现自动化，使座席和主管能够专注于客户服务的人性化方面。了解 Amazon Connect 的智能体 AI 功能如何帮助您简化联络中心工作流程并自动执行日常操作，同时始终将服务体验放在首位。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building at global scale: Engineering AWS expansion (ARC312)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全球规模构建：AWS扩展工程 (ARC312)
abstract: Explore how AWS continually expands its global infrastructure through sophisticated software engineering. This session reveals the evolution of AWS's approach to building new infrastructure, from manual processes to today's automated systems. Examine how changing global landscapes and business needs have shaped our strategies. Learn about the design patterns, testing frameworks, and operational practices that enable AWS to accelerate regional expansion while maintaining high security and reliability across our global infrastructure. Gain insights into architecting for massive scale and global distribution.
abstract_cn: 探索AWS如何通过先进的软件工程持续扩展其全球基础设施。本次会议揭示了AWS构建新基础设施方法的演变，从手动流程到当今的自动化系统。研究不断变化的全球格局和业务需求如何塑造我们的战略。了解使AWS能够加速区域扩展同时在全球基础设施中保持高安全性和可靠性的设计模式、测试框架和运营实践。深入了解大规模和全球分布式架构设计。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS: The Enterprise Standard for AI-Driven Workflows (AIM283)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS:企业级AI驱动工作流的标准 (AIM283)
abstract: ServiceNow and AWS are redefining what’s possible when intelligence meets scale. Together, we deliver AI-driven workflows with built-in trust, compliance, and performance—on the cloud designed for the enterprise. See how ServiceNow’s AI Agent Fabric, Control Tower, and Vault integrate with AWS Bedrock, SageMaker, and Security Hub to create a foundation for governed, intelligent automation at scale. Real stories from DXC reveal how organizations accelerate innovation, cut costs, and build the future of work with ServiceNow and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by ServiceNow, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: ServiceNow 和 AWS 正在重新定义智能与规模结合的可能性。我们共同提供具有内置信任、合规性和性能的 AI 驱动工作流——基于为企业设计的云平台。了解 ServiceNow 的 AI Agent Fabric、Control Tower 和 Vault 如何与 AWS Bedrock、SageMaker 和 Security Hub 集成，为大规模的受治理智能自动化创建基础。来自 DXC 的真实案例揭示了组织如何通过 ServiceNow 和 AWS 加速创新、降低成本并构建未来的工作方式。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 ServiceNow 提供。

presenter.name: Courtney McShane
presenter.title: AVP, Global Head of AWS Business, ServiceNow

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity: AWS Health & Support Data Pipelines to GenAI Actions (SPS318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Fidelity：AWS Health 与 Support 数据管道到 GenAI 行动 (SPS318)
abstract: Transform high-volume AWS Health and Support data into strategic advantage. While AWS provides comprehensive data streams, the volume and complexity present challenges for teams managing thousands of applications. This session explores how Fidelity collaborated with AWS through CENTS (Cloud Events Notification Transport System), successfully ingesting AWS Health data using prescriptive guidance. We demonstrate event routing across thousands of accounts, then showcase adding Support data and Amazon Bedrock for intelligent automation. Learn how GenAI enables individualized guidance and aggregate synthesis, advancing from reactive monitoring to predictive AI-augmented operational excellence with proven strategies.
abstract_cn: 将大量 AWS Health 和 Support 数据转化为战略优势。虽然 AWS 提供了全面的数据流，但数据量和复杂性给管理数千个应用程序的团队带来了挑战。本次会议探讨了 Fidelity 如何通过 CENTS（云事件通知传输系统）与 AWS 合作，使用规范性指导成功摄取 AWS Health 数据。我们演示了跨数千个账户的事件路由，然后展示了如何添加 Support 数据和 Amazon Bedrock 以实现智能自动化。了解 GenAI 如何实现个性化指导和聚合综合，从被动监控推进到预测性 AI 增强的卓越运营，并提供经过验证的策略。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Stripe: Revolutionizing compliance workflows w/ agentic infrastructure (IND3300)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Stripe: 通过智能体基础设施革新合规工作流程 (IND3300)
abstract: Financial services companies struggle to scale Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) processes while maintaining quality as merchant volumes grow. Learn how Stripe revolutionized compliance operations by building Eddie (EDD Detective)—an AI agent built on Amazon Bedrock that automates complex merchant risk assessments, reducing case handling time by 70% and enabling analysts to review 3x more cases. Discover how they built reliability and observability into agent operations, handling thousands of investigations daily while ensuring accuracy of AI-generated insights. Explore architectural patterns for orchestrating multi-step workflows, implementing human-in-the-loop validation, and maintaining audit trails at scale.
abstract_cn: 金融服务公司在商户数量增长的同时，难以在保持质量的前提下扩展强化尽职调查(EDD)流程。了解Stripe如何通过构建Eddie(EDD侦探)——一个基于Amazon Bedrock构建的AI代理——彻底改革合规运营，该代理可自动化复杂的商户风险评估，将案件处理时间缩短70%，使分析师能够审查3倍多的案件。探索他们如何在代理操作中构建可靠性和可观测性，每天处理数千项调查，同时确保AI生成洞察的准确性。探索用于编排多步骤工作流、实施人工参与验证以及大规模维护审计跟踪的架构模式。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Zero-Trust AI Agents with Okta, Auth0 and AWS (AIM249)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Okta、Auth0 和 AWS 构建零信任 AI 代理 (AIM249)
abstract: This session unveils Auth0 for AI Agents—a powerful solution enabling humans and non-human identities (NHI) to operate securely across AWS applications such as Bedrock and Quick Suite. Discover how Okta and Auth0 combine to empower agents with granular access controls and better user experiences. Through practical demos and real-world scenarios, we'll showcase how Auth0 for AI Agents leverages XAA (Cross App Access) and Model Context Protocol (MCP) to ensure secure collaboration within and across your AWS applications. Learn how to unlock the full potential of your agents with simplified identity management, robust security, organizational policies and user consent. This presentation is brought to you by Okta, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 本次会议揭示了 Auth0 for AI Agents——一个强大的解决方案,使人类和非人类身份(NHI)能够在 AWS 应用程序(如 Bedrock 和 Quick Suite)中安全运行。了解 Okta 和 Auth0 如何结合,通过细粒度访问控制和更好的用户体验为代理赋能。通过实际演示和真实场景,我们将展示 Auth0 for AI Agents 如何利用 XAA(跨应用访问)和模型上下文协议(MCP)来确保在 AWS 应用程序内部和跨应用程序的安全协作。了解如何通过简化的身份管理、强大的安全性、组织策略和用户同意来释放代理的全部潜力。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Okta 提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Quantum Computing with Amazon Braket: From Exploration to Enterprise (CMP411)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Braket 进行量子计算：从探索到企业应用 (CMP411)
abstract: Join us to explore the emerging field of quantum computing through Amazon Braket. This session outlines AWS's quantum strategy and latest service capabilities, demonstrating how organizations can begin experimenting with quantum algorithms alongside classical computing workloads. Senior technical and business leaders will gain a clear understanding of current quantum capabilities, experimental approaches, and how future quantum computers will integrate with HPC systems.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，通过 Amazon Braket 探索量子计算这一新兴领域。本次会议概述了 AWS 的量子战略和最新服务能力，演示组织如何开始在经典计算工作负载的同时试验量子算法。高级技术和业务领导者将清晰了解当前的量子能力、实验方法，以及未来量子计算机如何与高性能计算系统集成。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boost performance and reduce costs in Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS (DAT312)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 提升 Amazon Aurora 和 Amazon RDS 的性能并降低成本 (DAT312)
abstract: In this session, explore Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS cost components and learn important best practices that can help you improve the performance of your relational database workloads while reducing spend on cost components such as compute, storage, backup, and I/O. Learn about the latest performance monitoring features, which provide insights on how to efficiently track and optimize database performance at scale and help ensure that you’re maximizing efficiency while keeping costs under control.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索 Amazon Aurora 和 Amazon RDS 的成本组成部分，并学习重要的最佳实践，这些实践可以帮助您提高关系数据库工作负载的性能，同时降低计算、存储、备份和 I/O 等成本组成部分的支出。了解最新的性能监控功能，这些功能提供了如何大规模高效跟踪和优化数据库性能的洞察，并帮助确保您在控制成本的同时最大化效率。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge DevOps with AI-driven observability (DEV304)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI驱动的可观测性增强DevOps (DEV304)
abstract: Modern observability extends beyond logs and metrics to deliver understanding, context, and prediction. This session demonstrates how Generative AI transforms DevOps and SRE practices in CI/CD environments. Learn to build AI-enhanced observability systems using Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Q that automatically explain failures, correlate events, and provide predictive recommendations. Explore techniques for creating AI agents that simulate scenarios and stress-test architectures, enabling proactive insights with clear traceability. Attendees will gain practical knowledge to enhance their automation and incident response capabilities through AI-driven observability.
abstract_cn: 现代可观测性超越了日志和指标，提供理解、上下文和预测能力。本次会议演示了生成式AI如何在CI/CD环境中转变DevOps和SRE实践。学习使用Amazon Bedrock和Amazon Q构建AI增强的可观测性系统，自动解释故障、关联事件并提供预测性建议。探索创建AI代理的技术，模拟场景并对架构进行压力测试，通过清晰的可追溯性实现主动洞察。参会者将获得实用知识，通过AI驱动的可观测性增强其自动化和事件响应能力。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) for AWS (DVT202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 的持续集成和持续交付 (CI/CD) (DVT202)
abstract: AWS provides one place where you can plan work, collaborate on code, and build, test, and deploy applications with continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) tools. In this session, learn about creating complete CI/CD pipelines using infrastructure as code on AWS.
abstract_cn: AWS 提供了一个统一的平台，您可以在其中规划工作、协作编写代码，并使用持续集成和持续交付 (CI/CD) 工具来构建、测试和部署应用程序。在本次会议中，您将了解如何在 AWS 上使用基础设施即代码创建完整的 CI/CD 管道。

presenter.name: Steve Rice
presenter.title: General Manager, AWS AppConfig & Parameter Store

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe's Game-Changing Partnership with Sports Customers (SPF205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS ProServe 与体育客户的颠覆性合作伙伴关系 (SPF205)
abstract: Discover how AWS Professional Services helps sports media companies revolutionize fan engagement through innovative audio data analysis solutions. Learn how we tackle the challenges of implementing scalable audio processing architectures while maintaining real-time performance and cost efficiency. This session reveals our strategies for serverless architecture excellence, AI/ML integration, and accelerated innovation cycles. Perfect for technical leaders seeking insights into transforming media workflows through AWS expertise. Key Takeaways: Serverless audio processing strategies for sports media • AI/ML techniques for automated content detection • Real-world fan engagement transformation examples
abstract_cn: 了解AWS专业服务如何通过创新的音频数据分析解决方案帮助体育媒体公司彻底改变粉丝互动体验。了解我们如何应对实施可扩展音频处理架构的挑战，同时保持实时性能和成本效益。本次会议揭示了我们在无服务器架构卓越性、AI/ML集成和加速创新周期方面的策略。非常适合希望通过AWS专业知识深入了解媒体工作流程转型的技术领导者。主要收获：体育媒体的无服务器音频处理策略 • 用于自动内容检测的AI/ML技术 • 真实的粉丝互动转型案例

presenter.name: Abhisek Rath
presenter.title: Principal ProServe Account Executive (AWSI Media and Entertainment)

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS infrastructure as code: A year in review (DVT203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 基础设施即代码：年度回顾 (DVT203)
abstract: AWS provides services that enable the creation, deployment and maintenance of application infrastructure in a programmatic, descriptive, and declarative way. These services provide rigor, clarity, and reliability to application development. Join this session to learn about the new features and improvements for AWS infrastructure as code with AWS CloudFormation and AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) and discover how they can benefit your team.
abstract_cn: AWS 提供的服务能够以编程化、描述性和声明式的方式创建、部署和维护应用程序基础设施。这些服务为应用程序开发提供了严谨性、清晰性和可靠性。参加本次会议，了解 AWS CloudFormation 和 AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK) 基础设施即代码的新功能和改进，并探索它们如何使您的团队受益。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Simplify connectivity from remote sites - updates and eero integration (NET337)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化远程站点连接 - 更新和eero集成 (NET337)
abstract: Learn how AWS is simplifying enterprise connectivity for remote sites and distributed workforces. In this session, dive deep into latest innovations in AWS Site-to-Site VPN, showcasing how enterprises can establish secure and reliable connections from remote locations to their AWS workloads. Learn about the exciting collaboration between eero and AWS that's transforming remote site management with one-click integrations into services like AWS Site-to-Site VPN, AWS Transit Gateway, and AWS Cloud WAN. Discover how this solution delivers a centralized, intuitive management interface that eliminates the complexity of traditional network infrastructure while maintaining enterprise-grade security and performance.
abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何为远程站点和分布式员工简化企业连接。在本次会议中，深入探讨AWS Site-to-Site VPN的最新创新，展示企业如何从远程位置建立到其AWS工作负载的安全可靠连接。了解eero与AWS之间激动人心的合作，该合作通过一键集成AWS Site-to-Site VPN、AWS Transit Gateway和AWS Cloud WAN等服务，正在改变远程站点管理。探索此解决方案如何提供集中式、直观的管理界面，在保持企业级安全性和性能的同时消除传统网络基础设施的复杂性。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Turn unstructured data in Amazon S3 into AI-ready assets with SageMaker Catalog
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 SageMaker Catalog 将 Amazon S3 中的非结构化数据转换为 AI 就绪资产
abstract: Unstructured data often holds untapped value, and Amazon SageMaker makes it possible to turn that data into insights and AI-ready assets. In this session, you'll learn how to bring unstructured data from Amazon S3 into SageMaker, create searchable assets, and build knowledge bases for Amazon Bedrock to improve retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) accuracy. Discover how teams can collaborate across roles, data users can self-serve to find and understand the right data, and governance ensures that the right people get the right access. Bayer will share how they use these capabilities to unlock unstructured data and accelerate research and innovation.
abstract_cn: 非结构化数据通常蕴含着尚未开发的价值，而 Amazon SageMaker 使将这些数据转化为洞察和 AI 就绪资产成为可能。在本次会议中，您将学习如何将非结构化数据从 Amazon S3 导入 SageMaker，创建可搜索的资产，并为 Amazon Bedrock 构建知识库以提高检索增强生成 (RAG) 的准确性。了解团队如何跨角色协作，数据用户如何自助查找和理解正确的数据，以及治理如何确保合适的人员获得合适的访问权限。拜耳将分享他们如何使用这些功能来释放非结构化数据的价值并加速研究和创新。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale modernization with agentic AI featuring Thomson Reuters (MAM334)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用代理式AI扩展现代化，汤森路透案例分享 (MAM334)
abstract: Join Thomson Reuters to discover how they leveraged agentic AI service to revolutionize their .NET modernization journey. In this session you will learn how they leveraged AWS Transform for .NET to modernize 5M lines of code monthly, achieving a 4x acceleration in development velocity. Learn how they reduced application transformation time from months to a single sprint while cutting operating costs by 30%. This session demonstrates practical implementation of parallel modernization at scale, featuring both web and IDE experiences, and shares insights on using AI-powered agents to dramatically reduce technical debt while maintaining security and performance.
abstract_cn: 加入 Thomson Reuters，了解他们如何利用代理式 AI 服务彻底改变其 .NET 现代化之旅。在本次会议中，您将了解他们如何利用 AWS Transform for .NET 每月现代化 500 万行代码，实现开发速度提升 4 倍。了解他们如何将应用程序转型时间从数月缩短至单个冲刺周期，同时将运营成本降低 30%。本次会议展示了大规模并行现代化的实际实施，涵盖 Web 和 IDE 体验，并分享了使用 AI 驱动的代理大幅减少技术债务同时保持安全性和性能的见解。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Revolutionizing Audi's Welding Inspection System through AI (IND367)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过人工智能革新奥迪焊接检测系统 (IND367)
abstract: Learn how Audi implemented an AI-powered quality control system, transforming a traditional welding inspection processes. The system analyzes 1.5 million weld points across 300 vehicles per shift, expanding upon previous manual ultrasound inspections that covered only 5,000 points per vehicle. This AI integration enables production staff to focus on addressing potential anomalies, significantly enhancing quality monitoring efficiency. Following its success, Volkswagen Group is expanding this technology across multiple sites, including Audi Brussels, VW Emden, and Audi Ingolstadt. The implementation process includes site-specific AI model retraining to accommodate varying welding parameters, demonstrating a scalable approach to manufacturing quality control optimization.
abstract_cn: 了解奥迪如何实施AI驱动的质量控制系统,改造传统的焊接检测流程。该系统在每班次中分析300辆车的150万个焊点,相比之前每辆车仅覆盖5000个焊点的人工超声波检测有了大幅扩展。这种AI集成使生产人员能够专注于处理潜在异常,显著提升质量监控效率。在取得成功后,大众集团正在多个站点推广该技术,包括奥迪布鲁塞尔、大众埃姆登和奥迪英戈尔施塔特。实施过程包括针对不同焊接参数进行特定站点的AI模型重新训练,展示了制造质量控制优化的可扩展方法。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Better, faster, cheaper: How Valkey is revolutionizing caching (DAT458)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 更好、更快、更便宜：Valkey 如何革新缓存技术 (DAT458)
abstract: In this session, discover how the powerful combination of open source Valkey and Amazon ElastiCache is transforming the landscape of distributed caching. Explore recent innovations such as probabilistic data structures like bloom filters, a memory efficient dictionary that reduces memory usage by up to 40%, and a multi-threaded architecture that enables instantaneous scaling by up to 230%. We'll reveal the infrastructure that enables ElastiCache to seamlessly patch hundreds of thousands of customers while maintaining high availability, even for extreme workloads like Prime Day's trillion requests per minute.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，探索开源 Valkey 与 Amazon ElastiCache 的强大组合如何改变分布式缓存的格局。了解最新创新，例如布隆过滤器等概率数据结构、可将内存使用量减少高达 40% 的内存高效字典，以及支持高达 230% 即时扩展的多线程架构。我们将揭示使 ElastiCache 能够为数十万客户无缝修补补丁同时保持高可用性的基础设施，即使面对 Prime Day 每分钟万亿次请求等极端工作负载也能应对自如。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Train high-performing AI models at scale on AWS (AIM365)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上大规模训练高性能 AI 模型 (AIM365)
abstract: Training large AI models requires significant compute resources and can be time and cost intensive. In this session, learn to optimize and accelerate your model training workloads using AWS's purpose-built infrastructure and tools. We'll dive deep into leveraging services like Amazon SageMaker HyperPod for distributed training at scale and SageMaker fully managed training jobs for cost-effective ML acceleration. You'll learn to scale training across clusters using techniques like data and model parallelism, automated model tuning, and efficient checkpoint management. Through real customer examples, see how to reduce training time by up to 40%, optimize costs, and build high-performance training pipelines.
abstract_cn: 训练大型AI模型需要大量计算资源，可能耗时且成本高昂。在本次会议中，学习如何使用AWS专用基础设施和工具优化和加速模型训练工作负载。我们将深入探讨如何利用Amazon SageMaker HyperPod进行大规模分布式训练，以及使用SageMaker全托管训练作业实现经济高效的机器学习加速。您将学习使用数据并行和模型并行等技术跨集群扩展训练、自动化模型调优以及高效的检查点管理。通过真实客户案例，了解如何将训练时间缩短高达40%、优化成本并构建高性能训练管道。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps 3.0: Cost Intelligence for the AI Era (AIM268)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FinOps 3.0：AI时代的成本智能 (AIM268)
abstract: FinOps has evolved from visibility to optimization and now to action. As AI workloads introduce new cost complexities, organizations can no longer afford analysis paralysis or endless dashboards. It is time for FinOps 3.0: a shift where cost intelligence is embedded directly into engineering workflows, insights are contextual and role specific, and automation becomes a trusted ally rather than a leap of faith. This session explores how to apply lessons from Kubernetes cost management to today’s AI challenges and provides a practical roadmap to help teams innovate faster, smarter, and more sustainably in the cloud. This presentation is brought to you by DoiT, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: FinOps已从可见性演进到优化,现在进入到行动阶段。随着AI工作负载引入新的成本复杂性,组织再也无法承受分析瘫痪或无休止的仪表板。现在是FinOps 3.0的时候了:一种转变,将成本智能直接嵌入工程工作流程,洞察具有上下文相关性且针对特定角色,自动化成为值得信赖的盟友而非盲目的信任。本次会议探讨如何将Kubernetes成本管理的经验应用于当今的AI挑战,并提供实用路线图,帮助团队在云中更快、更智能、更可持续地创新。本演示由AWS合作伙伴DoiT提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - So Energy streamlines customer service with AI-powered automation (BIZ211)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - So Energy 通过 AI 驱动的自动化简化客户服务 (BIZ211)
abstract: Legacy contact center solutions weren’t built for today’s customer expectations. Managing fragmented voice, chat, and email systems creates friction for administrators, agents, and customers alike. Join AWS and So Energy — a UK-based renewable energy provider — to learn how you can modernise ageing customer service experiences by consolidating disjointed channels into a single, unified application with Amazon Connect. Leveraging AI-powered automation and deep CRM integration, learn how So Energy agents gained a single view of the customer journey, enabling them to resolve issues faster and reduce manual effort — while customers enjoy a seamless, consistent experience across every channel.
abstract_cn: 传统的联络中心解决方案无法满足当今客户的期望。管理分散的语音、聊天和电子邮件系统会给管理员、座席和客户带来摩擦。加入 AWS 和 So Energy（一家英国可再生能源供应商）的行列，了解如何通过 Amazon Connect 将分散的渠道整合到单一统一的应用程序中，从而实现老化客户服务体验的现代化。借助 AI 驱动的自动化和深度 CRM 集成，了解 So Energy 座席如何获得客户旅程的单一视图，使他们能够更快地解决问题并减少手动工作——同时客户可以在每个渠道享受无缝、一致的体验。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to advanced team structures in an agentic world (SNR307)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能体世界中高级团队结构的领导者指南 (SNR307)
abstract: As AI agents transform the workplace, organizations must adapt their structures and methodologies to harness new opportunities. The probabilistic nature of AI requires continuous iteration and intelligent oversight, creating new ways of working across business functions. To thrive, organizations must combine clear capability assessment with agile planning while leveraging their unique domain expertise and data assets. This keynote explores how leadership is evolving to meet these needs, covering new organizational models and roles that coordinate human-AI hybrid teams. Leaders will learn strategies for balancing rapid decision-making with strategic oversight, finding the optimal mix of centralized guidance and decentralized innovation.
abstract_cn: 随着AI代理改变工作场所，组织必须调整其结构和方法论以利用新机遇。AI的概率性特征需要持续迭代和智能监督，在各业务职能中创造新的工作方式。为了蓬勃发展，组织必须将清晰的能力评估与敏捷规划相结合，同时利用其独特的领域专业知识和数据资产。本主题演讲探讨领导力如何演进以满足这些需求，涵盖协调人机混合团队的新组织模型和角色。领导者将学习平衡快速决策与战略监督的策略，找到集中指导与分散创新的最佳组合。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - HPC at Scale with AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) (CMP340)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 并行计算服务 (PCS) 实现大规模 HPC (CMP340)
abstract: High performance computing workloads are growing in complexity, scale, and importance. AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) brings simplicity and flexibility to this challenge by automating cluster creation, job scheduling, and resource management. In this session, learn how PCS helps organizations move faster, scale securely, and achieve predictable performance for demanding workloads in energy, manufacturing, and research. Customers will share their experience building and running real-world HPC environments with PCS, including lessons learned and best practices. Join us to see how PCS is redefining the way high performance computing runs on AWS.
abstract_cn: 高性能计算工作负载在复杂性、规模和重要性方面不断增长。AWS Parallel Computing Service (PCS) 通过自动化集群创建、作业调度和资源管理，为这一挑战带来了简单性和灵活性。在本次会议中，了解 PCS 如何帮助组织更快地行动、安全地扩展，并为能源、制造和研究领域的高要求工作负载实现可预测的性能。客户将分享他们使用 PCS 构建和运行真实 HPC 环境的经验，包括经验教训和最佳实践。加入我们，了解 PCS 如何重新定义高性能计算在 AWS 上的运行方式。

presenter.name: Satoshi Ikemure
presenter.title: Administration Leader
presenter.company: Toyota Central R&D Labs (豊田中央研究所)

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimizing for high performance with Amazon ElastiCache Serverless (DAT437)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache Serverless 优化高性能 (DAT437)
abstract: Learn how to build highly scalable, high-performance applications with Amazon ElastiCache Serverless. View how ElastiCache Serverless works behind the scenes and dive deeper into the metrics to help you identify and debug application performance issues. This session will help you to build effective applications using ElastiCache Serverless and to leverage the design of the service to your advantage.
abstract_cn: 了解如何使用 Amazon ElastiCache Serverless 构建高度可扩展、高性能的应用程序。查看 ElastiCache Serverless 的后台工作原理，并深入了解有助于识别和调试应用程序性能问题的指标。本课程将帮助您使用 ElastiCache Serverless 构建高效的应用程序，并充分利用该服务的设计优势。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Next Frontier in Financial Systems: Transformer-based Foundation Models
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 金融系统的下一个前沿:基于Transformer的基础模型
abstract: Transformer-based foundation models are revolutionizing payment systems by providing deep contextual understanding of sequential transaction data. In this session, NVIDIA and AWS experts explain how large-scale tabular foundation models are trained and deployed to detect fraud in real time, personalize customer experiences, and interpret complex transaction patterns. Attendees will learn about the cloud-based AI factories enabling scalable deployment, NVIDIA’s accelerated computing for efficient training and tuning, and AWS’s secure and scalable cloud infrastructure. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 基于Transformer的基础模型正在通过对序列交易数据提供深度上下文理解来革新支付系统。在本次会议中，NVIDIA和AWS专家将解释如何训练和部署大规模表格基础模型，以实时检测欺诈、个性化客户体验并解释复杂的交易模式。与会者将了解支持可扩展部署的基于云的AI工厂、NVIDIA用于高效训练和调优的加速计算，以及AWS安全且可扩展的云基础设施。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供。

presenter.name: Pahal Patangia
presenter.title: Head of Global Industry Business Development, Payments

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Making Level 4 Autonomous Networks a reality with British Telecom (IND205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 与英国电信共同实现4级自主网络 (IND205)
abstract: BT is partnering with AWS to create a fully autonomous "Dark NOC" by integrating AI/ML, generative AI, and Agentic AI. Moving from traditional telecom to software-driven operations, BT has implemented GenAI-driven AIOps solutions that reduce costs and improve customer experience. The system uses AWS's agentic AI with autonomous agents and Amazon Sagemaker ML models to enable intelligent monitoring, automated network management, and advanced diagnostics. These AI agents proactively handle network issues and identify customer impacts, advancing BT's goal of zero-touch network operations.
abstract_cn: BT正在与AWS合作，通过集成AI/ML、生成式AI和智能体AI来创建完全自主的"暗网络运营中心"。从传统电信转向软件驱动运营，BT已实施GenAI驱动的AIOps解决方案，降低成本并改善客户体验。该系统使用AWS的智能体AI与自主代理以及Amazon Sagemaker机器学习模型，实现智能监控、自动化网络管理和高级诊断。这些AI智能体主动处理网络问题并识别客户影响，推进BT实现零接触网络运营的目标。

presenter.name: Ajay Ravindranathan
presenter.title: Principal Solutions Architect, Telecom Data & AI/ML

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modern Secrets: A Journey from Legacy Systems to AI-Ready Security (SEC213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代密钥管理：从传统系统到AI就绪安全的演进之旅 (SEC213)
abstract: Learn from Acquia's journey from complex legacy systems to cutting-edge secrets management with AWS Secrets Manager. Discover how Acquia revolutionized its security infrastructure, mastering multi-tenant isolation and achieving zero-downtime migration across hundreds of services. This is a potential blueprint for your modern security architecture. Perfect for forward-thinking architects and security leaders, you'll get exclusive insights into Acquia's transformation and how Acquia leveraged its relationship with AWS to drive its roadmap for Agentic AI integration and improved security via automated secrets rotation. This is valuable glimpse into large-scale and seamless secrets management.
abstract_cn: 了解 Acquia 如何从复杂的传统系统迁移到使用 AWS Secrets Manager 的尖端密钥管理。探索 Acquia 如何彻底改革其安全基础设施，掌握多租户隔离并在数百个服务中实现零停机迁移。这是您现代安全架构的潜在蓝图。非常适合具有前瞻性思维的架构师和安全领导者，您将获得关于 Acquia 转型的独家见解，以及 Acquia 如何利用其与 AWS 的关系来推动其 Agentic AI 集成路线图并通过自动化密钥轮换提高安全性。这是对大规模无缝密钥管理的宝贵洞察。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cochlear enhances contact center observability with Amazon Connect (BIZ215)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cochlear 通过 Amazon Connect 增强联络中心可观测性 (BIZ215)
abstract: Real-time visibility of contact center operations and customer interactions is critical to delivering excellent customer service. In this session, hear from Cochlear — the global leader in implantable hearing solutions — on how you can leverage Amazon Connect to observe and manage end-to-end customer experience operations, from forecasting contacts, to planning workforce schedules, to delivering human agent coaching, and beyond. Learn how Amazon Connect puts the power of AI in your hands to deliver end-to-end observability in your contact center.
abstract_cn: 联系中心运营和客户互动的实时可见性对于提供卓越的客户服务至关重要。在本次会议中，聆听全球植入式听力解决方案领导者Cochlear的分享，了解如何利用Amazon Connect观察和管理端到端的客户体验运营，从联系人预测、劳动力排班规划、人工座席辅导等各个方面。了解Amazon Connect如何将AI的力量交到您手中，在联系中心实现端到端的可观测性。

presenter.name: Hannah Bloking
presenter.title: Sr. Manager, Solutions Architecture - Applied AI Acceleration

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Art of Embracing Failures in Serverless Architectures (DEV312)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 无服务器架构中拥抱失败的艺术 (DEV312)
abstract: Serverless architectures offer the immense power of distributed systems wrapped in irresistible simplicity. But that simplicity is an illusion. Explore hidden pitfalls in distributed systems and practical strategies to build resilience, illustrated with real-world examples using AWS Lambda and Amazon Kinesis. Above all, embrace failures. In the words of Dr. Werner Vogels: everything fails, all the time.
abstract_cn: 无服务器架构提供了分布式系统的巨大能力,并以不可抗拒的简单性呈现。但这种简单性是一种假象。探索分布式系统中的隐藏陷阱以及构建弹性的实用策略,并通过使用 AWS Lambda 和 Amazon Kinesis 的真实案例进行说明。最重要的是,拥抱失败。用 Werner Vogels 博士的话来说:一切都会失败,无时无刻。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customize Your Mainframe Modernization with Composable agentic AI (MAM347)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用可组合代理式AI定制您的大型机现代化 (MAM347)
abstract: Master custom mainframe modernization with composable architecture. See how enterprise leaders are accelerating their modernization journeys by integrating specialized partner tools directly into AWS workflows with the power of agentic AI. Transformation leaders from Western Union and Unum will demonstrate how they built tailored solutions to address their unique modernization challenges, dramatically accelerating timelines while reducing risk. Learn how this composable approach enables customized solutions for even the most complex mainframe environments, and discover how to craft your optimized modernization workflow using AWS services integrated with trusted partner solutions.
abstract_cn: 通过可组合架构掌握定制化大型机现代化。了解企业领导者如何借助代理式AI的力量，将专业合作伙伴工具直接集成到AWS工作流程中，从而加速其现代化进程。来自西联汇款和Unum的转型领导者将展示他们如何构建定制化解决方案来应对独特的现代化挑战，大幅加快时间表同时降低风险。了解这种可组合方法如何为最复杂的大型机环境提供定制化解决方案，并探索如何使用AWS服务与可信赖的合作伙伴解决方案相集成，打造您的优化现代化工作流程。

presenter.name: Saurabh Shrivastava
presenter.title: Sr. Manager, WW Specialist Solutions Architecture

presenter.name: Will Holloway
presenter.title: Vice President, Consumer Service Products & Operations

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Rewriting the Code: Forging the future with AI, Empathy and Change (WOC101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重写代码：用AI、同理心和变革锻造未来 (WOC101)
abstract: Tech can change the world; empathy ensures it changes for the better. This session examines the critical intersection of generative AI, emotional intelligence, and women's unique role in shaping technology's future. Leaders and change makers are not just participants in the digital revolution—they are architects of more inclusive workplaces, industries, and communities. AWS is at the forefront of this transformation, implementing robust governance frameworks for responsible AI development. Women technologists at AWS are leading initiatives to ensure AI systems are trained on a variety of datasets and incorporate inclusive design principles from the ground up. Participants will gain perspectives on how AI-driven solutions can reduce bias, amplify voices, and create pathways for equitable progress. Let’s rewrite the code! This session is sponsored by Deloitte.
abstract_cn: 技术可以改变世界；同理心确保它向更好的方向改变。本次会议探讨生成式人工智能、情商以及女性在塑造技术未来中的独特角色这一关键交叉点。领导者和变革者不仅仅是数字革命的参与者——她们是更具包容性的工作场所、行业和社区的架构师。AWS处于这一转型的最前沿，实施强大的治理框架以实现负责任的人工智能开发。AWS的女性技术专家正在领导各项举措，以确保人工智能系统在各种数据集上进行训练，并从一开始就纳入包容性设计原则。参与者将获得关于人工智能驱动的解决方案如何减少偏见、放大声音并为公平进步创造途径的见解。让我们重写代码！本次会议由德勤赞助。

presenter.name: Mackenzie Herzog
presenter.title: VP, Player Performance and Strategic Innovation

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] What's new in Apache Iceberg v3 and beyond (OPN201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Apache Iceberg v3 及未来版本的新功能 (OPN201)
abstract: Join us to learn about Apache Iceberg Version 3 (V3) and how it addresses critical challenges in modern data lakes. In this session, we'll explore how V3's variant data type, deletion vectors and row lineage capabilities help organizations reduce storage costs, accelerate data operations, and maintain comprehensive audit trails at petabyte scale. We'll also look ahead to what's coming in Apache Iceberg V4. Whether you're managing large-scale data modifications, maintaining regulatory compliance, or optimizing data pipelines, discover how Iceberg V3 transforms data lake performance while reducing operational complexity and costs.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解 Apache Iceberg 版本 3 (V3) 以及它如何应对现代数据湖中的关键挑战。在本次会议中，我们将探讨 V3 的变体数据类型、删除向量和行级血缘功能如何帮助组织降低存储成本、加速数据操作，并在 PB 级规模下维护全面的审计跟踪。我们还将展望 Apache Iceberg V4 的未来发展。无论您是在管理大规模数据修改、维护合规性，还是优化数据管道，都可以了解 Iceberg V3 如何在降低运营复杂性和成本的同时转变数据湖性能。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Networking Fundamentals: Connect, secure and scale (NET208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 网络基础：连接、保护和扩展 (NET208)
abstract: Dive into AWS networking foundations, starting with the fundamentals of Amazon VPC in a single Region. Learn essential skills for IPv4 and IPv6 selection, subnetting, routing, DNS, and security before scaling to global, multi-Region architectures. In this session, explore various VPC connectivity methods, hybrid network integration, and secure traffic management techniques. Discover how to implement private remote access for cloud resources and optimize service-to-service communication while building zero trust architectures. Whether new to AWS or wanting to expand networking building blocks, this session delivers practical insights into best practices and proven architecture patterns for establishing global connectivity.
abstract_cn: 深入了解 AWS 网络基础知识，从单个区域中 Amazon VPC 的基本原理开始。学习 IPv4 和 IPv6 选择、子网划分、路由、DNS 和安全性的基本技能，然后扩展到全球多区域架构。在本次会议中，探索各种 VPC 连接方法、混合网络集成和安全流量管理技术。了解如何为云资源实施私有远程访问，并在构建零信任架构的同时优化服务间通信。无论您是 AWS 新手还是希望扩展网络构建模块，本次会议都将提供有关建立全球连接的最佳实践和经过验证的架构模式的实用见解。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Managing Amazon EC2 capacity and availability (CMP331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 管理 Amazon EC2 容量和可用性 (CMP331)
abstract: Amazon EC2 offers a variety of capacity usage and reservation models, so you can choose the right combination for your workload and budget. These include capacity reservations, On-Demand Instances, Amazon EC2 Capacity Blocks for ML, and more. Join this session to learn how to combine these models in a way that's best for your business. You'll walk away with knowledge on how to manage your capacity to improve utilization and availability.
abstract_cn: Amazon EC2 提供多种容量使用和预留模式，因此您可以为工作负载和预算选择正确的组合。这些模式包括容量预留、按需实例、Amazon EC2 Capacity Blocks for ML 等。参加本次会议，了解如何以最适合您业务的方式组合这些模式。您将掌握如何管理容量以提高利用率和可用性的知识。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025-From fragmented to unified platform: Rocket Companies data and AI journey-IND3306
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-从碎片化到统一平台：Rocket Companies的数据与AI之旅-IND3306
abstract: Enterprises seek to unify data access across the organization, safeguard sensitive client information, and scale MLOps efficiently. Learn how Rocket Companies addressed these challenges by building a unified data and AI platform on AWS. Discover how Rocket leveraged Amazon SageMaker for machine learning workflows, integrated with custom Amazon EKS applications and CI/CD pipelines, and implemented MLflow for model governance. See how Amazon DataZone can support secure enterprise-wide metadata management. Join this session to explore architectural patterns for data democratization, combined with MLOps excellence, showcasing practical solutions that streamline data and machine learning workflows while maintaining security controls.
abstract_cn: 企业寻求在整个组织内统一数据访问、保护敏感客户信息并高效扩展MLOps。了解Rocket Companies如何通过在AWS上构建统一的数据和AI平台来应对这些挑战。探索Rocket如何利用Amazon SageMaker进行机器学习工作流、与自定义Amazon EKS应用程序和CI/CD管道集成，以及实施MLflow进行模型治理。了解Amazon DataZone如何支持安全的企业级元数据管理。参加本次会议，探讨数据民主化的架构模式，结合MLOps卓越实践，展示简化数据和机器学习工作流同时保持安全控制的实用解决方案。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating E-commerce Insights with Snowflake Intelligence (AIM113)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用 Snowflake Intelligence 加速电子商务洞察 (AIM113)
abstract: The future of e-commerce demands instant, data-driven decisions. Discover how Decile, an e-commerce analytics platform, built its Luma AI analyst into its service using Snowflake Intelligence. Learn how Decile built a multi-tenant architecture to create custom agents for each brand. Decile unifies client data (from Shopify, Acxiom, and more) and enables users from marketers to executives to ask complex business questions in natural language. Luma immediately unlocks insights previously trapped behind BI reports, saving clients significant time and fundamentally changing how e-commerce leaders interact with their data. This presentation is brought to you by Snowflake, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 电子商务的未来需要即时的数据驱动决策。了解电子商务分析平台 Decile 如何使用 Snowflake Intelligence 将其 Luma AI 分析师构建到服务中。了解 Decile 如何构建多租户架构为每个品牌创建定制代理。Decile 统一客户数据（来自 Shopify、Acxiom 等），使从营销人员到高管的用户能够用自然语言提出复杂的业务问题。Luma 立即释放以前被困在 BI 报告背后的洞察，为客户节省大量时间，并从根本上改变电子商务领导者与数据交互的方式。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Snowflake 提供。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to achieving compliance through software excellence (SNR304)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者通过软件卓越实现合规的指南 (SNR304)
abstract: Traditional software development often resembles a manufacturing assembly line, where code passes from one developer to the next, creating idle time and fragmented documentation that fails to meet modern compliance demands. Modern application development offers a better way to simultaneously enhance productivity and satisfy regulatory requirements. Through integrated tooling and practices—including Git version control and automated testing—organizations can maximize developer productivity while naturally producing documentary proof that serves as compliance evidence. This session features real-world examples from leaders who have successfully leveraged these practices to meet critical compliance standards (FDA 21 CFR Part 11, ISO 13485, GMP Annex 11).
abstract_cn: 传统软件开发往往类似于制造业流水线，代码从一个开发人员传递到下一个开发人员，造成空闲时间和碎片化文档，无法满足现代合规要求。现代应用程序开发提供了一种更好的方式，可以同时提高生产力并满足监管要求。通过集成工具和实践——包括Git版本控制和自动化测试——组织可以最大化开发人员生产力，同时自然地生成可作为合规证据的文档证明。本次会议展示了成功利用这些实践来满足关键合规标准（FDA 21 CFR Part 11、ISO 13485、GMP Annex 11）的领导者的真实案例。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modernize Apple platform development with AWS and EC2 Mac (CMP334)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 和 EC2 Mac 实现 Apple 平台开发现代化 (CMP334)
abstract: EC2 Mac instances allow you to run on-demand macOS workloads in the cloud and extend the flexibility, scalability, and cost benefits of AWS to all Apple developers. In this session, you will learn about Apple application development in the cloud using EC2 Mac instances. We will share the latest features and advancements for EC2 Mac and how customers are benefiting from them. You will also hear firsthand from a customer on how they have optmized their Apple development worklfow and benefited from Apple application development in the cloud.
abstract_cn: EC2 Mac 实例允许您在云中运行按需 macOS 工作负载,并将 AWS 的灵活性、可扩展性和成本优势扩展到所有 Apple 开发者。在本次会议中,您将了解如何使用 EC2 Mac 实例在云中进行 Apple 应用程序开发。我们将分享 EC2 Mac 的最新功能和进展,以及客户如何从中受益。您还将直接听取客户讲述他们如何优化 Apple 开发工作流程,并从云中的 Apple 应用程序开发中获益。

presenter.name: Vishal Mummigatti
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager Technical - External Services

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix Shapes our Fleet for Efficiency and Reliability (IND387)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何塑造我们的机群以实现效率和可靠性 (IND387)
abstract: Netflix's strategy for optimizing its cloud architecture for efficiency and reliability. Placement of workloads on price-optimal hardware by automatically modeling capacity requirements and understanding AWS hardware performance and pricing. The talk will also cover a continuous optimization loop that monitors and reshapes the fleet to maintain business outcomes as load patterns change. Finally, it will touch upon managing traffic demand and compute supply to ensure availability during unexpected load shifts.
abstract_cn: Netflix通过自动建模容量需求并了解AWS硬件性能和定价，将工作负载部署在价格最优的硬件上，从而优化其云架构的效率和可靠性。该演讲还将介绍一个持续优化循环，该循环监控并重塑机群以在负载模式变化时维持业务成果。最后，它将涉及管理流量需求和计算供应，以确保在意外负载变化期间的可用性。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Integrated Diagnostics: Philips' AI Journey with AWS (IND219)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 转型综合诊断：飞利浦与AWS的AI之旅 (IND219)
abstract: Healthcare providers struggle with disconnected patient data sources across diagnostic platforms, hampering clinical decision-making. Philips addresses this through integrated cloud-based solutions in radiology, cardiology, and digital pathology, powered by AI capabilities. As digital pathology emerges as the next innovation frontier, cloud infrastructure becomes crucial for managing massive imaging datasets and enabling collaboration.Incorporating AWS HealthImaging and AWS generative AI tools, Philips has developed comprehensive digital pathology solutions that streamline workflows, enhance diagnostic accuracy, and enables global collaboration. The goal is to improve diagnosis and treatment planning through standardized DICOM implementation, AI-assisted analysis, and seamless data sharing across healthcare institutions worldwide.
abstract_cn: 医疗服务提供者面临着诊断平台间患者数据源分散的困境，这阻碍了临床决策。飞利浦通过在放射学、心脏病学和数字病理学领域提供集成的基于云的解决方案来解决这一问题，这些解决方案由人工智能能力驱动。随着数字病理学成为下一个创新前沿，云基础设施对于管理海量影像数据集和实现协作变得至关重要。结合AWS HealthImaging和AWS生成式人工智能工具，飞利浦开发了全面的数字病理学解决方案，可简化工作流程、提高诊断准确性并实现全球协作。其目标是通过标准化DICOM实施、人工智能辅助分析以及全球医疗机构间的无缝数据共享来改善诊断和治疗规划。

presenter.name: Jaron Nix
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager, AWS Applied AI Solutions

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovating with AWS Confidential Computing: An Integrated Approach (CMP407)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS机密计算进行创新：集成方法 (CMP407)
abstract: Confidential computing enables customers to protect code and data from unauthorized access during processing.  This session explores AWS's innovation on confidential computing capabilities including the AWS Nitro System, AWS Nitro Enclaves, and the Nitro Trusted Platform Module.  Learn how Nitro System capabilities can be used to meet evolving data protection challenges, such as confidential inferencing. The session will cover concepts that range from isolation from cloud operators to leveraging cryptographic capabilities on CPU, GPU, and AI accelerator-based instances for applications handling highly sensitive data such as personally identifiable information, financial assets, medical information, intellectual property, and AI data.
abstract_cn: 机密计算使客户能够在处理过程中保护代码和数据免遭未经授权的访问。本次会议探讨了AWS在机密计算能力方面的创新，包括AWS Nitro系统、AWS Nitro Enclaves和Nitro可信平台模块。了解如何使用Nitro系统功能来应对不断变化的数据保护挑战，例如机密推理。本次会议将涵盖从云运营商隔离到在基于CPU、GPU和AI加速器的实例上利用加密功能的概念，适用于处理高度敏感数据的应用程序，如个人身份信息、金融资产、医疗信息、知识产权和AI数据。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data modeling core concepts for Amazon DynamoDB (DAT311)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon DynamoDB 数据建模核心概念 (DAT311)
abstract: Join this session to learn the core concepts of Amazon DynamoDB data modeling. Explore best practices for common access patterns used by DynamoDB customers for applications that need consistent, fast performance at any scale. Developers experienced with DynamoDB can learn best practices and trade-offs to make when deciding on single-table and multi-table designs, indexing strategies, and more.
abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，学习 Amazon DynamoDB 数据建模的核心概念。探索 DynamoDB 客户常用访问模式的最佳实践，适用于需要在任何规模下实现一致、快速性能的应用程序。有 DynamoDB 经验的开发人员可以学习在决定单表和多表设计、索引策略等方面的最佳实践和权衡取舍。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagine business intelligence with Amazon Quick Sight (BIZ228)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon QuickSight 重新构想商业智能 (BIZ228)
abstract: Enterprises are transforming with AI-powered BI from Quick Sight, turning scattered data into strategic action. Watch as we demonstrate how Quick Sight eliminates barriers to data-driven decision making using AI agents, allowing everyone to uncover critical insights and achieve better business outcomes. Hear from Intuit as they share how they transformed their analytics capabilities with Quick Sight—helping users perform advanced data analysis and analyze both structured and unstructured data using AI. Discover how Intuit is democratizing insights across their organization, analyzing massive high-velocity data sets efficiently, and achieving scalability, all without managing infrastructure.
abstract_cn: 企业正在通过 Quick Sight 的 AI 驱动型商业智能进行转型，将分散的数据转化为战略行动。观看我们演示 Quick Sight 如何使用 AI 代理消除数据驱动决策的障碍，让每个人都能发现关键洞察并实现更好的业务成果。聆听 Intuit 分享他们如何通过 Quick Sight 转变其分析能力——帮助用户执行高级数据分析，并使用 AI 分析结构化和非结构化数据。了解 Intuit 如何在整个组织中实现洞察民主化，高效分析海量高速数据集，并实现可扩展性，而无需管理基础设施。

presenter.name: NEAL CAULEY
presenter.title: WW GTM Leader Amazon Quick Suite

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building agentic AI platform engineering solutions with open source (OPN303)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用开源构建代理式AI平台工程解决方案 (OPN303)
abstract: Join us for this session as we share our vision for driving innovation through open source agentic AI, and enhancing work-life quality for platform engineers worldwide. We'll explore real-world examples of how platform teams can apply autonomous agentic AI to their organizations, integrating AWS services alongside other open source projects such as Kubernetes, ArgoCD, Backstage and more.
abstract_cn: 加入我们的会议，我们将分享通过开源代理式AI推动创新的愿景，并提升全球平台工程师的工作生活质量。我们将探讨平台团队如何将自主代理式AI应用于其组织的实际案例，将AWS服务与其他开源项目（如Kubernetes、ArgoCD、Backstage等）集成。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Actionable controls for improving governance and compliance (COP347)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 改善治理和合规性的可操作控制措施 (COP347)
abstract: Organizations often struggle to translate complex regulatory requirements into practical controls while maintaining continuous compliance and security assurance. Learn how to transform compliance frameworks into actionable AWS controls through effective gap analysis and control mapping. This session shows how to leverage AWS Control Tower, AWS Security Hub, AWS Config, and AWS Audit Manager to build and maintain a scalable governance strategy. We'll explore real-world examples of mapping common controls across multiple frameworks, implementing automated compliance checks, and creating custom control deployments. Discover how to streamline compliance reporting while maintaining continuous security assurance across your AWS organization.
abstract_cn: 组织在将复杂的监管要求转化为实际控制措施的同时保持持续合规性和安全保障方面常常面临挑战。了解如何通过有效的差距分析和控制映射将合规框架转化为可操作的 AWS 控制措施。本课程展示如何利用 AWS Control Tower、AWS Security Hub、AWS Config 和 AWS Audit Manager 构建和维护可扩展的治理策略。我们将探讨跨多个框架映射通用控制措施、实施自动化合规检查以及创建自定义控制部署的实际案例。了解如何在整个 AWS 组织中简化合规报告的同时保持持续的安全保障。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Colgate, Commonwealth Bank and Mondelez: Why chose AWS for SAP transformation
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋国际：为何选择AWS进行SAP转型
abstract: For decades, SAP has been the business process backbone for leading companies across nearly every industry; and thousands of customers trust AWS to run SAP.Many customers who are still running their SAP applications on-premises, and their impending SAP migration is part of a broader transformation they are undertaking – where SAP is a critical application, but just one of the components of something bigger. In this session, customers like Colagate, Commonwealth Bank of Australia, and Mondelez will share their transformation journeys including moving SAP applications on AWS, and  how they are partnering with Amazon to chart the future for their organization.
abstract_cn: 数十年来，SAP一直是几乎所有行业领先企业的业务流程支柱；成千上万的客户信任AWS来运行SAP。许多仍在本地运行SAP应用程序的客户，其即将进行的SAP迁移是他们正在进行的更广泛转型的一部分——SAP是关键应用程序，但只是更大规模转型的组成部分之一。在本次会议中，高露洁、澳大利亚联邦银行和亿滋等客户将分享他们的转型历程，包括将SAP应用程序迁移到AWS，以及他们如何与亚马逊合作为其组织规划未来。

presenter.name: Soulat Khan
presenter.title: WW Head of SAP Solution Architects

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Prudential’s microagent platform with MCP and A2A on AWS (IND3302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在AWS上使用MCP和A2A构建Prudential的微代理平台 (IND3302)
abstract: Enterprises are exploring ways to scale their AI agent implementations beyond initial use cases. Learn how Prudential Financial is moving beyond single-purpose deployments with a scalable, microagent architecture powered by Amazon Bedrock and MCP agent-to-agent (A2A) communication. Prudential will share how their financial advisor assistant became the foundation for an enterprise multi-agent system, supporting diverse scenarios through modular design, independent scaling, and seamless deployment on AWS. Whether you’re exploring AI agents for specific business needs or building a foundation for enterprise-wide adoption, walk away with patterns and best practices for scaling AI agents.
abstract_cn: 企业正在探索如何将其AI代理实施扩展到初始用例之外。了解保德信金融如何通过由Amazon Bedrock和MCP代理到代理(A2A)通信驱动的可扩展微代理架构，超越单一用途部署。保德信将分享其财务顾问助手如何成为企业多代理系统的基础，通过模块化设计、独立扩展和在AWS上的无缝部署来支持多样化场景。无论您是在探索针对特定业务需求的AI代理，还是在构建企业级采用的基础，都可以获得扩展AI代理的模式和最佳实践。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deploy Quick Suite at scale with confidence and control (BIZ225)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模部署 Quick Suite，充满信心与掌控力 (BIZ225)
abstract: Learn how enterprise deployment strategies enable Quick Suite scale while maintaining security and operational excellence. Through a compelling customer story, discover how leading organizations have successfully deployed  AI agents, automation, and business intelligence capabilities of Quick Suite across global operations while meeting strict regulatory requirements. Explore identity management integration, access control patterns, and governance frameworks. Discover monitoring and audit strategies that ensure proper oversight while enable business agility across multi-account and cross-region deployments.
abstract_cn: 了解企业部署策略如何在保持安全性和卓越运营的同时实现 Quick Suite 的规模化。通过引人入胜的客户案例，探索领先组织如何在满足严格监管要求的同时，成功地在全球运营中部署 Quick Suite 的 AI 代理、自动化和商业智能能力。探索身份管理集成、访问控制模式和治理框架。了解监控和审计策略，这些策略可确保在多账户和跨区域部署中实现适当监督的同时支持业务敏捷性。

presenter.name: Emily Zhu
presenter.title: Sr. Product Manager, Amazon Quick Suite, AWS

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Secure in milliseconds: Visa's AI-powered fraud defense on AWS (IND3313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 毫秒级安全防护：Visa 基于 AWS 的 AI 驱动欺诈防御系统 (IND3313)
abstract: Discover how Visa revolutionized real-time payment security by leveraging AWS services, including AWS Nitro Enclaves, Amazon EKS, and Amazon MemoryDB, for their Visa Protect solution. This session explores Visa's journey to a rapidly scalable, cloud-based fraud detection solution. Learn how Visa processes massive volumes of sensitive financial data with ultra-low latency while maintaining stringent security standards. We'll dive into the multi-region architecture, real-time AI/ML fraud detection on Amazon EKS, and compute-level isolation that allowed Visa to achieve sub-250 millisecond fraud detection latency and 99.99% availability. Join us to uncover the blueprint for secure, AI-driven payment risk scoring.
abstract_cn: 了解Visa如何利用AWS服务(包括AWS Nitro Enclaves、Amazon EKS和Amazon MemoryDB)彻底改变实时支付安全，打造其Visa Protect解决方案。本次会议探讨Visa向快速可扩展的云端欺诈检测解决方案转型的历程。了解Visa如何以超低延迟处理海量敏感金融数据，同时保持严格的安全标准。我们将深入探讨多区域架构、Amazon EKS上的实时AI/ML欺诈检测，以及使Visa实现低于250毫秒欺诈检测延迟和99.99%可用性的计算级隔离。加入我们，揭示安全、AI驱动的支付风险评分蓝图。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Netflix Connects Product Experiments to its AWS Bill (IND388)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Netflix 如何将产品实验与其 AWS 账单关联 (IND388)
abstract: How do you measure the cost of innovation? At Netflix, a "winning" A/B test can create hidden cloud infrastructure costs that offset its business value. This session details our strategy for connecting product experiments to their infrastructure costs. We'll share our framework for identifying an experiment's impact on our cloud systems and show how we translate that impact into a projected AWS cost. Learn how this enables our teams to make smarter, more cost-aware product decisions at scale.
abstract_cn: 如何衡量创新的成本？在Netflix，一个"成功的"A/B测试可能会产生隐藏的云基础设施成本，从而抵消其业务价值。本次会议详细介绍了我们将产品实验与其基础设施成本关联起来的策略。我们将分享用于识别实验对云系统影响的框架，并展示如何将这种影响转化为预测的AWS成本。了解这如何使我们的团队能够大规模地做出更明智、更具成本意识的产品决策。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build Advanced Search with Vector, Hybrid, and AI Techniques (ANT314)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用向量、混合和AI技术构建高级搜索 (ANT314)
abstract: Amazon OpenSearch Service is at the heart of how Artificial Intelligence is transforming the way we store, search, and use data. Learn how businesses are using AI to power their search-backed applications, achieving significant improvements in search accuracy and performance with OpenSearch Service’s advanced vector capabilities. Learn how Recruit uses OpenSearch Service to find available tables for "Hot Pepper Gourmet" diners. Dive deep into OpenSearch’s vector capabilities, and its role in building chat bots and agentic search. You’ll learn how to build scalable, high-performance, and cost-optimal solutions so that you can incorporate these technologies in your stack.
abstract_cn: Amazon OpenSearch Service 是人工智能转变我们存储、搜索和使用数据方式的核心。了解企业如何使用 AI 为其搜索支持的应用程序提供动力，通过 OpenSearch Service 的高级向量功能在搜索准确性和性能方面实现显著改进。了解 Recruit 如何使用 OpenSearch Service 为"Hot Pepper Gourmet"食客查找可用餐桌。深入探讨 OpenSearch 的向量功能及其在构建聊天机器人和代理搜索中的作用。您将学习如何构建可扩展、高性能且成本优化的解决方案，以便将这些技术融入您的技术栈中。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A leader's guide to AI strategy and implementation (SNR305)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者的AI战略与实施指南 (SNR305)
abstract: As generative and agentic AI transform business models, leaders must architect new operating models that bridge technology capabilities with business value. This advanced session reveals proven approaches for scaling AI from experiments to enterprise-wide value creation. Learn to shape AI-driven business strategies, design advanced decision systems, and build governance frameworks that accelerate adoption while managing risk. Leaders will leave with practical guidance to orchestrate AI capabilities and organizational transformation, execute their vision, drive innovation, and deliver quantifiable returns through scaled AI deployment.
abstract_cn: 随着生成式和代理式人工智能改变商业模式，领导者必须构建新的运营模式，以连接技术能力与业务价值。本高级会议揭示了将人工智能从实验扩展到企业级价值创造的成熟方法。学习如何塑造人工智能驱动的业务战略、设计高级决策系统，以及构建治理框架，在管理风险的同时加速采用。领导者将获得实用指导，以编排人工智能能力和组织转型、执行愿景、推动创新，并通过规模化人工智能部署实现可量化的回报。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Beyond EHR: Leveraging AWS for Maximum Clinical and Operational Impact (IND213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 超越电子健康记录：利用AWS实现最大临床和运营影响 (IND213)
abstract: Successful EHR hosting on AWS has become standard practice, as evidenced by AWS' 2025 Best in KLAS rating for public cloud. This session features two innovative health systems demonstrating how they've moved beyond basic EHR implementation to create competitive advantages with AWS. Leaders will share strategies for moving past "lift-and-shift" to drive meaningful innovation by leveraging cloud-native solutions, extending EHR functionality, and developing unique patient and provider experiences. Through real-world examples, attendees will learn practical approaches to healthcare innovation, value creation frameworks, and implementation insights. Designed for technology leaders, digital strategists, and clinical innovation teams seeking to differentiate their organizations.
abstract_cn: 在AWS上成功托管EHR已成为标准实践，AWS在2025年KLAS公有云评级中获得最佳评级即为证明。本次会议将展示两个创新型医疗系统如何超越基本的EHR实施，利用AWS创造竞争优势。领导者将分享超越"直接迁移"的策略，通过利用云原生解决方案、扩展EHR功能以及开发独特的患者和医疗服务提供者体验来推动有意义的创新。通过实际案例，与会者将学习医疗创新的实用方法、价值创造框架和实施见解。本会议专为寻求使其组织脱颖而出的技术领导者、数字战略师和临床创新团队设计。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming SAP with AWS AI services: AxFood and Harman’s AI journey (MAM214)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AWS AI服务转型SAP：AxFood和Harman的AI之旅 (MAM214)
abstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) continues to revolutionize enterprise operations, SAP customers like AxFood and Harman International are harnessing the power of AWS's cutting-edge  AI capabilities to revolutionize enterprise operations. This session explores the transformative potential of integrating AWS's AI innovations with SAP ecosystems to drive unprecedented levels of efficiency, creativity, and user engagement.
abstract_cn: 随着人工智能(AI)持续革新企业运营,像AxFood和Harman International这样的SAP客户正在利用AWS前沿的AI能力来革新企业运营。本次会议探讨了将AWS的AI创新与SAP生态系统集成的变革潜力,以推动效率、创造力和用户参与度达到前所未有的水平。

presenter.name: Erik Kamman
presenter.title: Head of WW Solution Architecture, SAP GTM

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a Secure Foundation for SAP RISE and Non-SAP Workload (NTA318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 为 SAP RISE 和非 SAP 工作负载构建安全基础 (NTA318)
abstract: Discover how global enterprises successfully migrate SAP RISE and non-SAP workloads to AWS. This session explores the critical foundational aspects of AWS cloud migration, showcasing the implementation of a multi-account strategy that optimizes security and resource management.You'll learn how to build a secure landing zone, set up comprehensive backups, and establish integrated Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) capabilities.Learn how these key elements formed the backbone of AWS cloud migration, supporting both SAP and non-SAP ecosystems. You'll gain insights into overcoming challenges and implementing strategies that can accelerate AWS cloud adoption.
abstract_cn: 了解全球企业如何成功将SAP RISE和非SAP工作负载迁移到AWS。本次会议探讨AWS云迁移的关键基础方面，展示多账户策略的实施，以优化安全性和资源管理。您将学习如何构建安全的着陆区、设置全面的备份以及建立集成的安全信息和事件管理(SIEM)功能。了解这些关键要素如何构成AWS云迁移的支柱，支持SAP和非SAP生态系统。您将获得克服挑战和实施策略的见解，从而加速AWS云采用。

presenter.name: Syafili Lie
presenter.title: Head of Solutions Architecture, Canada Enterprise Greenfield

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Universal data connectivity with ETL and SQL queries (ANT209)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 ETL 和 SQL 查询实现通用数据连接 (ANT209)
abstract: Learn how AWS can help you with data integration and preparing data for analytics, machine learning (ML) and generative AI workloads. Explore new capabilities that enable your users to have controlled access to all relevant data, easily build and maintain scalable and resilient data pipelines, and enhance decision-making quality,all with exceptional price performance. See how zero-ETL and query federation can complement ETL and ELT data pipelines.
abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何帮助您进行数据集成并为分析、机器学习 (ML) 和生成式 AI 工作负载准备数据。探索新功能，使您的用户能够对所有相关数据进行受控访问，轻松构建和维护可扩展且具有弹性的数据管道，并提高决策质量，同时实现卓越的性价比。了解零 ETL 和查询联合如何补充 ETL 和 ELT 数据管道。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI: Industry-Driven Architecture Excellence (NTA203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AgenticAI：行业驱动的架构卓越 (NTA203)
abstract: Discover how industry-specific requirements shape architectural patterns for effective Agentic AI implementations. This session explores how tailored architectural frameworks address unique challenges in healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and logistics. Through real-world use cases, learn the critical design considerations that drive innovation across sectors. Attendees will gain practical knowledge of implementation strategies that unlock Agentic AI's transformative potential, enabling them to apply these architectural patterns within their own industries.
abstract_cn: 探索行业特定需求如何塑造有效的智能体AI实施架构模式。本次会议探讨定制化架构框架如何应对医疗保健、金融、制造和物流领域的独特挑战。通过真实用例，了解推动各行业创新的关键设计考量。与会者将获得实施策略的实用知识，释放智能体AI的变革潜力，使他们能够在自己的行业中应用这些架构模式。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What Anthropic Learned Building AI Agents in 2025 (AIM277)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Anthropic 在 2025 年构建 AI 代理的经验教训 (AIM277)
abstract: 2025 was the year AI agents went from demos to production. In this session, we share what Anthropic discovered building Claude Code and working alongside customers deploying agents at scale throughout the year. We'll examine how AI engineering practices evolved, then dive deep into the patterns that keep agents reliable across hours of autonomous work: context engineering, skills, and our newest frontier model Opus 4.5. Finally, we'll look ahead at the trends we believe will define the next wave of agentic AI. This presentation is brought to you by Anthropic, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 2025年是AI代理从演示走向生产的一年。在本次会议中，我们将分享Anthropic在构建Claude Code以及与全年大规模部署代理的客户合作过程中的发现。我们将探讨AI工程实践如何演进，然后深入研究使代理在数小时自主工作中保持可靠的模式：上下文工程、技能以及我们最新的前沿模型Opus 4.5。最后，我们将展望我们认为将定义下一波代理AI的趋势。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Anthropic呈现。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building Production Agent Swarms: Mastering Industrial AI (DEV311)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建生产级智能体集群：掌握工业AI (DEV311)
abstract: AI systems are evolving beyond multi-modal understanding into autonomous collaboration and problem-solving for industry-specific challenges. This technical session demonstrates how to build and orchestrate multi-agent systems that leverage industry expertise with LLMs. Topics include agent orchestration framework customization, advanced RAG patterns for domain knowledge, collaborative decision-making mechanisms, and production-scale observability. Drawing from real implementations, the session covers critical architecture decisions, common pitfalls, and proven solutions. Participants will gain practical patterns and code examples for building next-generation AI systems with memory, planning, and industry-specific collaboration capabilities.
abstract_cn: AI系统正在从多模态理解演进为针对行业特定挑战的自主协作和问题解决。本技术会议演示如何构建和编排利用行业专业知识与大语言模型的多智能体系统。主题包括智能体编排框架定制、用于领域知识的高级RAG模式、协作决策机制以及生产规模的可观测性。会议基于实际实施案例，涵盖关键架构决策、常见陷阱和经过验证的解决方案。参与者将获得用于构建具有记忆、规划和行业特定协作能力的下一代AI系统的实用模式和代码示例。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A complete guide to Amazon EVS: Unlock AWS scale for VMware workloads (MAM201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon EVS 完全指南：为 VMware 工作负载释放 AWS 规模能力 (MAM201)
abstract: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) is your fastest path to run VMware workloads on AWS, eliminating the need to replatform or refactor. Discover how Amazon EVS helps you unlock AWS scale and agility while maximizing existing VMware investments and skillsets. Explore core building blocks and guidance on self-managing or leveraging AWS Partners for your environments. We'll cover strategies for customizing your virtualization stack in the cloud, including integration with storage, backup, and disaster recovery solutions. Through a live demo, we'll showcase intuitive deployment workflows and share the latest service innovations to provide you with more choice and flexibility.
abstract_cn: Amazon Elastic VMware Service (Amazon EVS) 是您在 AWS 上运行 VMware 工作负载的最快路径,无需重新平台化或重构。了解 Amazon EVS 如何帮助您释放 AWS 的规模和敏捷性,同时最大化现有 VMware 投资和技能组合的价值。探索核心构建模块以及自我管理或利用 AWS 合作伙伴管理环境的指导。我们将介绍在云中自定义虚拟化堆栈的策略,包括与存储、备份和灾难恢复解决方案的集成。通过实时演示,我们将展示直观的部署工作流程,并分享最新的服务创新,为您提供更多选择和灵活性。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transforming Apache Kafka into a Scalable Message Queue (OPN413)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 将 Apache Kafka 转变为可扩展的消息队列 (OPN413)
abstract: Event streaming in Apache Kafka is powerful, but sometimes a queue-based model is more suited for workloads where parallel consumption is more important than ordering. KIP-932 introduces share groups, a feature that allows consumers to cooperatively consume data from Kafka topics, akin to how message queues work. This enables per-message acknowledgment, retries, and load distribution without the complexities of partition management. Ideal for independent work items, this approach simplifies message handling and enhances scalability. Join us to learn how KIP-932 brings queuing semantics to Kafka, enabling more flexible, efficient processing in event-driven architectures.
abstract_cn: Apache Kafka 中的事件流处理功能强大，但有时基于队列的模型更适合并行消费比顺序更重要的工作负载。KIP-932 引入了共享组功能，允许消费者协作地从 Kafka 主题消费数据，类似于消息队列的工作方式。这实现了按消息确认、重试和负载分配，而无需处理分区管理的复杂性。这种方法非常适合独立的工作项，简化了消息处理并增强了可扩展性。加入我们，了解 KIP-932 如何将队列语义引入 Kafka，在事件驱动架构中实现更灵活、高效的处理。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Future is Human: Intentional Innovation in the AI Era (WOC102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 未来以人为本：AI时代的有意创新 (WOC102)
abstract: The pace of change in technology and the cloud demands human-centered leadership, grounded in intention and inclusion. Today’s leaders must deliver progress at speed while earning trust and creating cultures where both people and ideas can thrive in the future of work. This session brings together women driving transformation in the cloud to share how intentional leadership requires listening deeply, fostering confidence, and navigating uncertainty. Learn the priorities that drive meaningful impact and enable innovation in today’s rapidly evolving landscape. Moderated by Christina Mitine, Sr. Go-To-Market Lead. The panel will feature AWS Customers.
abstract_cn: 技术和云计算的变革步伐要求以人为本的领导力，植根于意图和包容性。当今的领导者必须快速推进进步，同时赢得信任并创造让人才和创意在未来工作中蓬勃发展的文化。本次会议汇集了推动云计算转型的女性领导者，分享有意图的领导力如何需要深入倾听、培养信心和驾驭不确定性。了解在当今快速演变的环境中推动有意义影响和促进创新的优先事项。由Christina Mitine（高级市场推广负责人）主持。小组成员将包括AWS客户。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Measuring AI Impact with Amazon Q Developer and Jellyfish (DVT219)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Q Developer 和 Jellyfish 衡量 AI 影响 (DVT219)
abstract: Development leaders are struggling to show the impact of AI in software development. No single tool, such as Amazon Q Developer, can give the full picture. In this session hear from Genesys about their journey to measure the impact of AI and how the integration of Amazon Q Developer metrics into the Jellyfish platform gave them the visibility they needed. Attendees will learn about ways that AI Impacts software development, how the ingestion of Q Developer metrics into Jellyfish can shed light on those impacts over time and how a customer took that information and was able to tell the story of the impact of AI on their Development process.
abstract_cn: 开发领导者正在努力展示人工智能在软件开发中的影响。没有单一工具(例如 Amazon Q Developer)能够提供完整的全貌。在本次会议中,您将了解 Genesys 衡量人工智能影响的历程,以及将 Amazon Q Developer 指标集成到 Jellyfish 平台如何为他们提供所需的可见性。与会者将了解人工智能影响软件开发的方式、将 Q Developer 指标导入 Jellyfish 如何随时间推移揭示这些影响,以及客户如何利用这些信息讲述人工智能对其开发流程影响的故事。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG Risk Intelligence: Accelerating World-Check with AI (GBL207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - LSEG风险智能：利用AI加速World-Check (GBL207)
abstract: LSEG’s Risk Intelligence business offers various solutions in the risk screening, digital identity and due diligence space to Financial Institutions. The Content Curation AI project is focused on improving data services which rely on manual processes to analyse and identify media coverage of individuals or companies engaged in risky behaviour. The goal is to automate, ingest and analyse information, alleviating tactical burden on staff and in doing so, free up human resources to focus on higher level value add contributions. Thus increasing LSEG's competitive advantage in the product marketplace. Programme running live in production and being run with AWS, LSEG and MeshAI.
abstract_cn: LSEG的风险情报业务为金融机构提供风险筛查、数字身份和尽职调查领域的各种解决方案。内容策展AI项目专注于改进依赖人工流程来分析和识别从事风险行为的个人或公司媒体报道的数据服务。该项目的目标是自动化、摄取和分析信息,减轻员工的战术负担,从而释放人力资源以专注于更高层次的增值贡献。这将提升LSEG在产品市场中的竞争优势。该项目目前在生产环境中运行,由AWS、LSEG和MeshAI共同运营。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Make agents remember with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory (AIM331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory 让代理具备记忆能力 (AIM331)
abstract: Intelligent agents with memory capabilities can deliver smarter, more personalized interactions—but implementing memory in production is no easy task. In this session, we’ll cover how to build context-aware agents using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory. Learn to manage short-term and long-term memory securely, structure agent interactions around user history, and scale memory. Hear from Experian on how they are reimagining conversational memory architecture across their AI ecosystem. Learn about their framework for hierarchical context and how the availability of AgentCore Memory is shaping their direction toward a simpler approach for future AI-driven products and services.
abstract_cn: 具有记忆能力的智能代理可以提供更智能、更个性化的交互——但在生产环境中实现记忆并非易事。在本次会议中，我们将介绍如何使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory 构建具有上下文感知能力的代理。学习如何安全地管理短期和长期记忆，围绕用户历史构建代理交互，以及扩展记忆功能。了解 Experian 如何在其 AI 生态系统中重新构想对话记忆架构。了解他们的分层上下文框架，以及 AgentCore Memory 的可用性如何引导他们朝着更简单的方法发展，以构建未来的 AI 驱动产品和服务。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerating Development and DevSecOps with Amazon Bedrock and Kiro (PEX303)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock 和 Kiro 加速开发和 DevSecOps (PEX303)
abstract: Discover how AWS partners are leveraging Amazon Bedrock and Kiro to revolutionize both software architecture design and DevSecOps practices. Through real-world examples, explore powerful patterns that enhance the entire development lifecycle. Learn how to use GenAI to accelerate cloud architecture design processes—generating standardized patterns, optimizing configurations, ensuring compliance, and creating documentation. Explore how to integrate AI capabilities with security scanning tools, automated code generation, CI/CD pipelines, and threat modeling frameworks. This session showcases how AWS partners have implemented these solutions to improve consistency, maintain compliance, and automate security tasks. Bring your questions to this collaborative session.
abstract_cn: 探索AWS合作伙伴如何利用Amazon Bedrock和Kiro来革新软件架构设计和DevSecOps实践。通过真实案例，了解增强整个开发生命周期的强大模式。学习如何使用GenAI加速云架构设计流程——生成标准化模式、优化配置、确保合规性并创建文档。探索如何将AI能力与安全扫描工具、自动化代码生成、CI/CD管道和威胁建模框架集成。本次会议展示AWS合作伙伴如何实施这些解决方案以提高一致性、维护合规性并自动化安全任务。欢迎在这个协作会议中提出您的问题。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using graphs over your data lake to power generative AI applications (DAT447)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在数据湖上使用图技术为生成式AI应用提供支持 (DAT447)
abstract: In this session, learn about new Amazon Neptune capabilities for high-performance graph analytics and queries over data lakes to unlock the implicit and explicit relationships in your data, driving more accurate, trustworthy generative AI responses. We'll demonstrate building knowledge graphs from structured and unstructured data, combining graph algorithms (PageRank, Louvain clustering, path optimization) with semantic search, and executing Cypher queries on Parquet and Iceberg formats in Amazon S3. Through code samples and benchmarks, learn advanced architectures to use Neptune for multi-hop reasoning, entity linking, and context enrichment at scale. This session assumes familiarity with graph concepts and data lake architectures.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，了解 Amazon Neptune 在高性能图分析和数据湖查询方面的新功能，以解锁数据中的隐式和显式关系，从而提供更准确、更可信的生成式 AI 响应。我们将演示如何从结构化和非结构化数据构建知识图谱，将图算法（PageRank、Louvain 聚类、路径优化）与语义搜索相结合，并在 Amazon S3 中的 Parquet 和 Iceberg 格式上执行 Cypher 查询。通过代码示例和基准测试，学习使用 Neptune 进行多跳推理、实体链接和大规模上下文增强的高级架构。本次会议假定您熟悉图概念和数据湖架构。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - An unexpected journey building AWS MCP Servers (OPN401)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建 AWS MCP 服务器的意外之旅 (OPN401)
abstract: This session explores the evolution from generic AI coding assistants to AWS-intelligent development tools through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Attendees will learn how MCP transforms AI assistants by injecting AWS-specific context, best practices, and service knowledge directly into development workflows. We'll demonstrate using 25+ open-source AWS MCP servers that provide real-time access to CDK patterns, cost analysis, Amazon Bedrock capabilities, and infrastructure guidance. Through live demos and examples, you'll discover how to configure and leverage existing MCP servers that understand AWS services. Leave with practical skills to enhance your AI assistants for accelerated serverless and AI application development.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了从通用AI编码助手到AWS智能开发工具的演进过程，这一转变通过模型上下文协议（MCP）实现。与会者将学习MCP如何通过直接向开发工作流注入AWS特定上下文、最佳实践和服务知识来转变AI助手。我们将演示使用25+个开源AWS MCP服务器，这些服务器提供对CDK模式、成本分析、Amazon Bedrock功能和基础设施指导的实时访问。通过现场演示和示例，您将了解如何配置和利用理解AWS服务的现有MCP服务器。您将掌握实用技能，以增强AI助手，从而加速无服务器和AI应用程序开发。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale Security Operations with AWS Security Incident Response Service (SEC329)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 安全事件响应服务扩展安全运营 (SEC329)
abstract: Ready to modernise your incident response? Learn how Infor accelerated their security operations using AWS Security Incident Response service. Through Infor's implementation journey, learn how to automate investigation and remediation while maintaining consistency at scale. We'll cover service integration with Security Hub and GuardDuty, automated playbook execution, and cross-account coordination. SOC teams will learn practical strategies for implementing automated workflows for containment and forensics collection. Walk away with implementation patterns to reduce response times while maintaining audit controls across your AWS environment.
abstract_cn: 准备好实现事件响应现代化了吗？了解 Infor 如何使用 AWS Security Incident Response 服务加速其安全运营。通过 Infor 的实施历程，学习如何自动化调查和修复，同时保持大规模的一致性。我们将介绍该服务与 Security Hub 和 GuardDuty 的集成、自动化剧本执行以及跨账户协调。SOC 团队将学习实施自动化工作流程的实用策略，用于遏制和取证收集。您将掌握实施模式，以缩短响应时间，同时在整个 AWS 环境中维护审计控制。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Epic journey: Navigating the AI-powered SDLC from backlog to production(DVT208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 史诗之旅：从待办事项到生产环境的AI驱动软件开发生命周期导航(DVT208)
abstract: Developers, join an epic journey as we follow a humble backlog item through the winding path of the software development lifecycle from user story to deployment. Most developers spend less than an hour per day writing code. So why do focus so much attention on using AI to write code faster? In this session you will learn how Kiro CLI can help you with every stage of the SDLC.
abstract_cn: 开发者们，加入我们的史诗之旅，跟随一个普通的待办事项穿越软件开发生命周期的曲折路径，从用户故事到部署。大多数开发者每天花在编写代码上的时间不到一小时。那么为什么我们如此关注使用AI来更快地编写代码呢？在本次会议中，您将了解Kiro CLI如何在软件开发生命周期的每个阶段为您提供帮助。

title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building multi-tenant SaaS agents with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (SAS407)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建多租户 SaaS 代理 (SAS407)
abstract: The introduction of Amazon Bedrock AgentCore equips builders with a range of new tools and technologies.
